name: Dice juggle
description:
If you can's start the game, try reloading

Balancing is a little off

Use your mouse to hit the dice into the correct place and get points! Don't become overwhelmed - if one goes below the screen you will lose health.  

Each time you hit one of the dice, its face will change. Dice with higher values will score you more points if you manage to get them into the correct place. 

Made for the GMTK game jam 2022, with the theme 'roll of a dice'.
